title: pAlincu mInAkSi
sahitya:
pAlincu mInAkSi parama kalyANi nannu


anupallavi

  vELa idi amma vEgavati tIravAsini


caraNam    nIku nAma kIrtanamulu nityam kIrti bhaktulapai
nIdu nayana krpAkaTAkSamu indukava cintyEtaNDri
nAku moralu nIku pratidinam delupa valanA dayAsAgarI
nA bAgadIrchi brOvarAdA mAtangi rAjapUjitE
		(madhyamakAla)
mujjagamula sajjana manujulu gejja piDisi daya pApamuto
gajja kaSTige dEvage nanurantitamuga vinutapada pari
